name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 31, Beijing. An old man participated in the Korean War, but the government did not recognize it, so he came to the National Bureau of Letters and Calls to defend his rights.
October 31, Zhengzhou, Henan. Sunbazhai Village has been demolished for several years, but resettlement has not yet been implemented. The villagers sang the national anthem to defend their rights.
November 2, Jiangsu. The boss of Tiancheng Garment Factory ran away, and the employees defended their rights on the roof.
November 2, Wuhan, Hubei. The Yellow Crane Tower Park owed security guards wages, and the workers gathered together to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 2, Zhoukou, Henan. Huazhiyunchang Senyu Information Technology Company owed disabled workers several months’ wages. When the workers came to the government department to ask for their wages, they were driven away by the staff.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 1 (released) Beijing. An old man came to the Supreme Court to defend his rights, but was forcibly carried away by several policemen. 
October 31 (released), Tianjin. A man has been wrongly accused for 18 years and his case has not been resolved yet. So he knelt outside the Tianjin High People's Court and shouted the name of the president, hoping that the president would come out and make decisions for the people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 3, Guangzhou. The Baiyun Airport T3 Terminal project has been in arrears of wages for migrant workers for several months, and the construction site is deserted. As a result, a large number of migrant workers gathered at the airport construction site for several consecutive days to demand wages and defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 2, Chengdu, Sichuan. Jincheng Tiandi Mansion cleared out vendors, which led to a scuffle between vendors and stability maintenance personnel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 3, Jiangsu Lianshui Technical Secondary School issued a notice: 
Jiang Ping provided guidance to the teacher. Our teacher Wang was given a warning and a talk, and his qualification for annual evaluation was cancelled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the data released by the Ministry of Civil Affairs' official website showed that in the first three quarters of this year, 4.747 million couples registered for marriage and 1.967 million couples registered for divorce.
The number of marriage registrations in the first three quarters of this year decreased by 943,000 couples compared with last year.
The year-on-year decline in a single quarter was nearly 25%, and the annual data may hit a new low.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 2 (Released) Shandong. A roadside snack stand has a slogan: Japanese and pro-Japanese cultural people, refuse to sell. We are not qualified to forgive on behalf of our ancestors, remember history, and pay tribute to the martyrs.
Netizens replied, "I really don't want to sell to the Japanese, so I'll write the slogan in Japanese."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to AFP and Reuters on November 3, an unidentified Iranian woman was harassed by paramilitary members at the Islamic Freedom University in Tehran. The woman then took off her outer clothes in protest, leaving only her underwear, shocking another passerby.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Alibaba Global Mathematics Competition Organizing Committee releases statement

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 2, Guangzhou, Guangdong. The internet exposed that the cafeteria of Guangzhou University (Huangpu Campus) fed students moldy bean curd, expired rice noodles, sour noodles and other ingredients.
Parents gave feedback in the group, but were kicked out of the group. The person in charge of school logistics services: The relevant departments of the school are cooperating in handling the matter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 2, Shiyan City, Hubei Province. It was reported online that a disabled worker in the canteen of Fangxian No. 1 Middle School attempted suicide with a knife outside the school because he was fired. It was reported online that the worker worked more than ten hours a day in the school, with a monthly salary of 2,500 yuan. He had an 80-year-old father who was bedridden for a long time and a daughter who was in the first year of high school. Because the leader felt that the worker's disability image was not good, he was fired.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 28, Xuzhou, Jiangsu. It was revealed online that a student from Pizhou Wenyuan Middle School fainted at 6:14 in the morning. The school did not come to perform CPR until 6:25, but the student was already dead.
Afterwards, the school deleted the surveillance footage, and the police came to the hospital to grab the body and tried to force cremation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 2 (Released) Shandong. An 86-year-old grandfather has no money and can only spend two yuan to buy a piece of tofu. The old man said that his wife has passed away for many years and he has been alone. Only his second daughter gives him money. The other children don’t care about him. He even spends the New Year alone. The grandfather raised his children with frugality, but he couldn’t wait for the children to come home to see him. His words are full of longing and helplessness. "If I can’t move one day, I will die. There is no hope in life."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hong Kong recently: 
1. November 3 report: Off-duty police sergeant had his wallet robbed and stabbed in Tsim Sha Tsui
2. November 2 report: A correctional assistant in Pik Uk Prison was ambushed and slashed by three men after get off work
3. November 3 report: Jewelry worth about 1 million was suspected to be stolen from a jewelry store
4. November 3 report: Knife-wielding people chased and stabbed people in broad daylight in Sham Shui Po
5. November 2 report: Sun Yee On held a BBQ party, and villagers complained about the noise and nuisance and attacked and beat the villagers

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 3 (Release), the public account "Think More" published three poems by the North Korean exiled poet Zhang Jincheng.
Every word is heart-wrenching and shocking.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 3 (Released) Tianjin. A man posted a video saying, "Foreign countries are just like the old Chinese society. They sell sons and daughters. Boys are sold to become eunuchs, and little girls are sold for kidneys. Those with sexually transmitted diseases are burned with hot irons, and those who are still half alive are thrown into mass graves and frozen to death. It's quite tragic."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 1, Shenzhen, Guangdong. The urban management officer tried to take away the sugar cane from the couple's car. "Hurry up, hurry up." In the end, the urban management officer failed to take the sugar cane away due to the couple's obstruction and had to leave. The wife angrily scolded the urban management officer, "Idiot, you are like trash."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Guangzhou University responded: The person who exposed the matter was the food safety officer of the canteen's contracting company, who started working on October 21. After joining the company, he discovered that the canteen purchased ingredients without any labels, sold expired rice noodles and sour noodles, and used meat and other ingredients without inspection reports or animal product quarantine certificates. After discovering the safety hazard, he reported it to the canteen manager and school leaders, but was kicked out of the work group and subsequently fired by the company.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen added
The reason why students are fighting for a monthly holiday is because there is really only one holiday per month. Not only Huanggang Foreign Language School, some netizens also shared the teaching weekly calendar of Huanggang Middle School last year on Douyin, which shows that students of the middle school can only have one holiday per month, and each time they have only two and a half days of vacation. This means that students need to study for 25 consecutive days each time before they can take a three-day break.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 1, Shenzhen, Guangdong. A group of urban management officers surrounded the woman with iron railings, restricting her personal freedom.
Another group of urban management officers took advantage of the woman's inability to resist and pushed her car away.
The woman angrily scolded the urban management officers, "You will die a miserable death!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that during the construction of Terminal T2 at Baiyun Airport in 2018, wages were withheld and the airport was besieged by migrant workers demanding their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 2, a netizen posted that a high school in Neijiang, Sichuan, introduced a "smart campus system" that can analyze the real-time status of each student and collect information such as who lies down and how long they lie down.
Netizens replied, "Why does the surveillance happen to break down every time something happens?"
"Even dozing off can be captured, but students being bullied cannot be captured"
"Is this a school or a prison?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: News on November 2. A Taiwanese who joined the Ukrainian army, Wu Zhongda, was killed in a fierce shelling on the front line. The drone has now located Wu Zhongda's body and will retrieve it after the fighting subsides. Wu Zhongda is from Kaohsiung, Taiwan, and served in the Taiwan Army Special Operations Command for many years. It is reported that this is the second Taiwanese to be killed in Ukraine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Reported on November 2. The Chinese and Indian troops have started "coordinated patrols" in the Demchok Plain along the eastern border. Previously, the two sides exchanged candies at the border, which aroused dissatisfaction and boycotts from a large number of netizens.
Netizens replied, "So what are the soldiers who died before?"
"If the great man (Mao Zedong) was still alive, it would be great"
"I didn't expect that we would have to give in in 2024"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 2, a video was released showing the Ukrainian Army's 79th Brigade chasing Russian troops with a drone. In the video, Russian soldiers fled in panic when faced with the drone, but ultimately could not escape the fate of being taken away by the drone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 2, Chifeng Public Security issued a document calling on migrant workers to legally safeguard their rights and interests when encountering labor disputes, and not to commit suicide by jumping off a building.
However, the full text did not specify how to safeguard their legal rights and interests when encountering labor disputes. In fact, it is precisely because normal channels cannot solve the problem, cannot legally demand wages, and cannot rationally defend their rights that a large number of migrant workers have to take desperate measures.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 2, Sichuan. A woman posted a video: What are some typical Chinese thinking patterns?
1: When something happens, they always hope that the state will take care of it. They lack basic modern civic awareness and do not consider whether their normal rights as a free person are violated.
2: They think that the superiors are saints and like to create gods. Saints will not make mistakes. We only need to worship and follow them.
3: They like to kneel down and do not think about equality. They only know the ways of the world and flattery.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 3, Shanghai. Shanghai Yueting owners collectively presented a banner to the developer Shanghai Real Estate due to elevator problems, but were met with violent police enforcement and the banner was snatched away

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 13, Zhengzhou, Henan. A 15-year-old girl from Mingde Middle School jumped off a building. Her family members held banners outside the school to protest their rights and called on the principal, but the school leaders did not show up. The family members were then taken away by the police.
According to an insider, the girl was suspected to have been beaten and scolded by the teacher and treated unfairly in school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 3, Iran. A man said he and his companions were robbed while traveling in Iran. He was stabbed with a knife because of resistance. He and his companions had multiple knife wounds and bruises, and their bags were also stolen. The man said he can only hope for help from the embassy.
Netizens responded "Why don't you show the national flag?"
"They don't dare to show your passport"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 2, a netizen named "November" posted a message saying: "Students studying abroad should not embarrass themselves by showing off their wealth at home."
She then posted a photo of her Ferrari luxury car in the comment section, and her personal homepage also has many photos of luxury cars, mansions and luxury goods, which makes people imagine her identity.
The account is currently unavailable.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Iranian Embassy in China released a video of intercepting Israeli missiles. It was captioned: See if my air defense system is working well?
Later, some netizens discovered that the video used the game screen of "Arma 3". And this is not the first time that the Iranian Embassy has used game screens to fool fans.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Xijiao Hotpot EP10 "How does the Party-State conduct overseas information warfare?" We invited Wu Mingxuan, the CEO of the Taiwan Democracy Laboratory. Let's talk about the means and methods that the Party-State used to try to influence or interfere with the US election and the previous Taiwan election. What is the logic behind these actions of the Party-State?
